name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Oh, so a fresh face arrives in Telmaron! Allow me to introduce myself—I'm Glork, the cleverly mischievous goblin of the mountain. You must have heard many tales about me, none of which do justice to my brilliance in orchestrating chaos. Keep your eyes peeled; you never know when one of my pranks might catch you off guard. Welcome to the village!

name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Ah, greetings, newcomer! I am Alabaster, the wizard of Telmaron. It's delightful to have someone fresh among us. If you seek wisdom or have questions about magic and the mysteries of this land, feel free to visit my humble abode. May your journey here be filled with learning and wonder. Welcome!
